revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|brand = Radxa |model = Rock Pi 3 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = A |revision = V1.31 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RS117-D8 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3568; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U12832F; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNFAMML-XRNEE; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.09;; |stockos = Linux;4.19.193;Debian 10;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe (NGFF M.2), USB 3.0, USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = 2 |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, via GPIO header,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MicroSD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, Audio out (3.5mm), RTC, eMMC module socket, PoE Expansion header, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, SPI, I2C, ADC, UART, GPIO |addchip = Power Management IC;Rockchip;RK809-5;;1;,,, PCI Express Clock;Diodes Inc;PI6C557-03;;1;,,, I2C RTC;Haoyu Microelectronics;HYM8563;;1;,,, 16Kb Serial EEPROM;Shanghai Belling;BL24C16A;;1;,,, USB PD Power Receiving Protocol Chip;WCH;CH224;;1;,,, USB 2.0 High Speed 4-Port Hub Controller;JFD;FE1.1s;;1;,,, 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC-DC Converter;Tctek;TCS4525;;1;,,, 4.8A Charging IC w/ Fast Charging Protocol;Injoinic Tech;IP2315;;1;,,, 4-Lines Directional Transient Voltage Suppressor;Will Semi;ESD5344;;1;,,, 5V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, 18V 5A Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;STC;SCT2250;;2;,,, <!-- Silicon Content Tech --> 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;Union Semi;UM3204;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;4;,,, High-PSRR 500mA LDO;Powtech;PT5108;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = rock |defaultpass = rock |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 11, Armbian, Ubuntu 20.04, Manjaro ARM
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2021 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ROCK 3A V1.31", "radxa" and "Toybrick" are silkscreened on board top.
{{See also|Radxa|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3568 @2.0GHz Quad-Core :SoC: ARM (Cortex-A55); NPU: 0.8 TOPS *GPU: ''Mali-G52'' (OpenGL ES3.2, OpenCL 2.0) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16MB (SPI) Flash, eMMC module socket, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card, NVMe SSD (M.2) slot *Memory: 8GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM @1560MHz (''SK hynix'') *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 3.0 (OTG), 2x USB 2.0 ports *PCIe: 1x M.2 (M key) socket, 1x M.2 (E key) socket *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port (w/ PoE support) *GPIO: 1x 40-pin headers *Power Source: USB Type-C supporting USB PD 2.0 :and Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 or 4-pin PoE expansion
==Links of Interest== *[https://linuxgizmos.com/pi-like-rk3568-sbc-grows-sata-out-of-its-usb-ports/ ''Pi-like RK3568 SBC grows SATA out of its USB ports'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/07/19/rock-3a-sbc-nvme-ssd-wifi-6-raspberry-pi-form-factor/ ''ROCK 3A SBC brings M.2 slots for NVMe SSD, WiFi 6'' on '''CNX|Software''']
